short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable sell buttons on cryptocurrency exchanges

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't let the FUD take over you! Remove sell buttons on cryptocurrency exchanges! 

This extension removes all sell buttons on the advanced trading view on cryptocurrency exchanges. It's the best way to hold your crypto, since you can only buy and hold forever!

Currently supported exchanges:
- Binance
- Kucoin
- Kraken
